summary.span: 验证用户凭据并管理用户设置。

span.span: Validates user credentials and manages user settings.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于 ASP.NET 应用程序中验证用户凭据和管理用户设置，例如密码和电子邮件地址。The class is used in ASP.NET applications to validate user credentials and manage user settings such as passwords and email addresses. 类可用于在其自身，或结合创建一个完整的系统的 Web 应用程序或站点的用户进行身份验证。The class can be used on its own, or in conjunction with the to create a complete system for authenticating users of a Web application or site. 控件封装类以提供一个用于验证用户的方便机制。The control encapsulates the class to provide a convenient mechanism for validating users. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 成员资格功能，请参阅[简介成员资格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980)才能继续。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980) before continuing. 与成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 类提供用于工具：The class provides facilities for: - 创建新用户。Creating new users. - 在 Microsoft SQL Server 或备用数据存储区中存储成员身份信息 （用户名、 密码、 电子邮件地址和支持的数据）。Storing membership information (user names, passwords, email addresses, and supporting data) in Microsoft SQL Server or in an alternative data store. - 对访问您的网站的用户进行身份验证。Authenticating users who visit your site. 可以验证用户身份以编程方式，或者可以使用控件创建一个要求很少或没有代码的完整的身份验证系统。You can authenticate users programmatically, or you can use the control to create a complete authentication system that requires little or no code. - 管理密码，其中包括创建、 更改、 检索和重置密码，等等。Managing passwords, which includes creating, changing, retrieving, and resetting them, and so on. 你可以选择配置为需要的密码提示问题和答案忘记密码的用户的密码重置和检索请求进行身份验证的 ASP.NET 成员资格。You can optionally configure ASP.NET membership to require a password question and answer to authenticate password reset or retrieval requests for users that have forgotten their password. 尽管 ASP.NET 成员资格是 ASP.NET 为身份验证中的独立功能，但它可以与 ASP.NET 角色管理，以便提供你的站点的授权服务集成。Although ASP.NET membership is a self-standing feature in ASP.NET For authentication, it can be integrated with ASP.NET role management to provide authorization services for your site. 此外可以与 ASP.NET 用户集成成员资格向单个用户提供特定于应用程序可以定制的自定义项。Membership can also be integrated with the ASP.NET user to provide application-specific customization that can be tailored to individual users. 有关详细信息，请参阅[了解角色管理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6)和[ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For details, see [Understanding Role Management](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6) and [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). 类依赖于成员资格提供程序与数据源进行通信。The class relies on membership providers to communicate with a data source. .NET Framework 包括，它在 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中，用于存储用户信息和，从而使你可以在 Active Directory 或 Active Directory 应用程序模式 (ADAM) 服务器上存储用户信息。The .NET Framework includes a , which stores user information in a Microsoft SQL Server database, and an , which enables you to store user information on an Active Directory or Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) server. 你也可以实现一个自定义成员资格提供程序来与可以通过使用备用数据源进行通信类。You can also implement a custom membership provider to communicate with an alternative data source that can be used by the class. 自定义成员资格提供程序继承抽象类。Custom membership providers inherit the abstract class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[实现成员资格提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8658b8e-c962-4f64-95e1-4acce35e4582)。For more information, see [Implementing a Membership Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8658b8e-c962-4f64-95e1-4acce35e4582). 默认情况下，已为所有 ASP.NET 应用程序中启用 ASP.NET 成员身份。By default, ASP.NET membership is enabled for all ASP.NET applications. 默认成员资格提供程序和同名的计算机配置中指定`AspNetSqlProvider`。The default membership provider is the and is specified in the machine configuration with the name `AspNetSqlProvider`. 默认实例配置为连接到 Microsoft SQL Server 的本地实例。The default instance of the is configured to connect to a local instance of Microsoft SQL Server. 你可以修改默认设置以指定以外`AspNetSqlProvider`实例作为默认的提供程序，或为 ASP.NET 应用程序使用 Web.config 文件的默认提供程序指定的自定义提供程序实例。You can modify the default settings to specify a other than the `AspNetSqlProvider` instance as the default provider, or specify an instance of a custom provider as the default provider for your ASP.NET application using the Web.config file. Web 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中使用的配置节，可以指定 ASP.NET 成员身份配置。You can specify the ASP.NET membership configuration for your Web application using the configuration section in the Web.config file. 你可以使用`providers`要指定非默认的提供程序的其他成员资格提供程序的部分的子部分。You can use the `providers` subsection of the section to specify a membership provider other than one of the default providers. 例如下, 一节从当前的应用程序配置中移除默认成员资格提供程序并添加新的提供程序名称为`SqlProvider`用于将连接到名为的 SQL Server 实例`AspSqlServer`。For example, the following section removes the default membership providers from the current application configuration and adds a new provider with a name of `SqlProvider` that connects to a SQL Server instance named `AspSqlServer`. ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 ASP.NET 应用程序配置为使用 forms 身份验证和 ASP.NET 成员身份的登录页。The following code example shows the login page for an ASP.NET application configured to use forms authentication and ASP.NET membership. 如果提供的用户凭据无效，则向用户显示一条消息。If the supplied user credentials are invalid, a message is displayed to the user. 否则，用户将重定向到最初请求的 URL 使用方法。Otherwise, the user is redirected to the originally requested URL using the method. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 登录控件 (， ， ， ，和) 封装几乎所有提示用户输入凭据并在成员资格系统中验证凭据所需的逻辑和可以是以编程方式检查使用来代替类。The ASP.NET login controls (, , , , and ) encapsulate virtually all of the logic required to prompt users for credentials and validate the credentials in the membership system and can be used in place of programmatic checking using the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/CS/logincs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/VB/loginvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application.
The name of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于标识特定于应用程序的用户。The is used to identify users specific to an application. 即，同一用户名称可以存在多个 ASP.NET 应用程序指定不同的数据库中。That is, the same user name can exist in the database for multiple ASP.NET applications that specify a different . 这使多个应用程序能够使用相同的数据库来存储用户信息而不会遇到重复的用户名称冲突。This enables multiple applications to use the same database to store user information without running into duplicate user name conflicts. 或者，多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以使用相同的用户数据库，通过指定相同。Alternatively, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user database by specifying the same . 可以在 Web 应用程序的配置中以编程方式或以声明方式设置。The can be set programmatically or declaratively in the configuration for the Web application. > [!CAUTION] > 因为一个默认成员资格提供程序实例用于所有服务的请求对象，您可以有多个请求并发执行，并尝试设置属性值。Because a single default membership provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 属性不是线程安全的多个写操作，并不断变化属性值可能会导致多个用户的应用程序的意外行为。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 我们建议你避免编写代码，用户可设置属性，除非必要，否则。We recommend that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the property, unless you must. 应用程序的示例设置属性可能需要是管理应用程序管理多个应用程序的成员身份数据。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages membership data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应为单用户应用程序和不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序使用实例并设置到`MyApplication`。It specifies that the application use a instance and sets the to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将新用户添加到数据存储并返回新创建的用户的对象。 adds a new user to the data store and returns a object for the newly created user. 如果用户创建失败，引发。If the user creation fails, a is thrown. 你可以检索值从属性，该值指示用户创建失败的原因。You can retrieve a value from the property of the that indicates why user creation failed. 成员资格用户已创建且您拥有对引用为该用户对象，可以修改该用户的设置与公共方法，如应用程序的其中是`true`，或通过设置属性值的对象并将它们传递给方法。Once a membership user has been created and you have a reference to a object for that user, you can modify the settings for that user with the public methods, such as for applications where is `true`, or by setting the property values of the object and passing them to the method. 如果用户已存在于应用程序的数据源，可以获取与现有的用户对象方法。If a user already exists in the data source for the application, you can obtain a object for the existing user with the method. 提供一个选项以便为每个用户都需要唯一的电子邮件地址。The provides an option to require a unique email address for each user. 如果属性是`true`，你将需要使用之一重载，您可以指定要创建的用户的电子邮件地址。If the property is `true`, you will need to use one of the overloads that allows you to specify an email address for the user being created. 否则为将引发。Otherwise, a will be thrown. 删除所有参数值的前导和尾随空格。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新 ASP.NET 应用程序配置为使用 forms 身份验证和 ASP.NET 成员资格用户。The following code example creates a new user for an ASP.NET application configured to use forms authentication and ASP.NET membership. 如果未成功创建用户，则向用户显示一条消息。If the user is not created successfully, a message is displayed to the user. 否则，用户重定向到应用程序的登录页。Otherwise, the user is redirected to the login page for the application. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 将新用户添加到数据存储并返回新创建的用户的对象。 adds a new user to the data store and returns a object for the newly created user. 如果用户创建失败，则可以检索值从`status`输出参数，该值指示用户创建失败的原因。If the user creation fails, you can retrieve a value from the `status` output parameter that indicates why user creation failed. 方法将返回`null`如果`password`为空字符串或`null`，`username`为空字符串或`null`或包含逗号 （，）、`passwordQuestion`不`null`和为空字符串，或`passwordAnswer`不`null`和包含一个空字符串。The method will return `null` if `password` is an empty string or `null`, `username` is an empty string or `null` or contains a comma (,), `passwordQuestion` is not `null` and is an empty string, or `passwordAnswer` is not `null` and contains an empty string. 成员资格用户已创建且您拥有对引用为该用户对象，可以修改该用户的设置与公共方法，以及设置的属性值对象，然后将对象传递给方法。Once a membership user has been created and you have a reference to a object for that user, you can modify the settings for that user with the public methods and by setting the property values of the object and then passing the object to the method. 如果用户已存在于应用程序的数据源，可以获取与现有的用户对象方法。If a user already exists in the data source for the application, you can obtain a object for the existing user with the method. 删除所有字符串参数值的前导和尾随空格。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all string parameter values. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 将新用户添加到数据存储并返回新创建的用户的对象。 adds a new user to the data store and returns a object for the newly created user. 如果用户创建失败，则可以检索值从`status`输出参数，该值指示用户创建失败的原因。If the user creation fails, you can retrieve a value from the `status` output parameter that indicates why user creation failed. 你可以通过使用指定的用户，如数据库的主键值的唯一标识符`providerUserKey`参数。You can specify a unique identifier for the user, such as a primary key value for a database, by using the `providerUserKey` parameter. 方法将返回`null`如果`password`为空字符串或`null`，`username`为空字符串或`null`或包含逗号 （，）、`passwordQuestion`不`null`和包含一个空字符串，或`passwordAnswer`不`null`和包含一个空字符串。The method will return `null` if `password` is an empty string or `null`, `username` is an empty string or `null` or contains a comma (,), `passwordQuestion` is not `null` and contains an empty string, or `passwordAnswer` is not `null` and contains an empty string. 成员资格用户已创建且您拥有对引用为该用户对象，可以修改该用户的设置与公共方法，以及设置的属性值对象，然后将对象传递给方法。Once a membership user has been created and you have a reference to a object for that user, you can modify the settings for that user with the public methods and by setting the property values of the object and then passing the object to the method. 如果用户已存在于应用程序的数据源，可以获取与现有的用户对象方法。If a user already exists in the data source for the application, you can obtain a object for the existing user with the method. 删除所有字符串参数值的前导和尾随空格。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all string parameter values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密码重置是指 ASP.NET 成员资格用户忘记其密码或当前的密码将不再有效时替换当前的密码为一个新的用户名称随机生成密码的能力。Password reset is the ability for ASP.NET membership to replace the current password for a user name with a new, randomly generated password when a user has forgotten their password or the current password is no longer valid. 这是特别有用的当密码格式设置为，因为用户无法检索经过哈希处理的密码值。This is especially useful when password format is set to , as users cannot retrieve hashed password values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序使用的实例并启用密码重置。It specifies that the application use an instance of the and enables password reset. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例首先验证是`true`，然后重置用户的密码，并返回自动生成的新密码。The following code example first verifies that is `true`, then resets a user's password and returns the new, automatically generated password. span.span: if the membership provider supports password retrieval; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`false`，基础成员资格提供程序可能会引发。If is `false`, the underlying membership provider may throw a . .NET Framework 附带的提供程序支持多个密码格式，以增强密码的安全性。The providers that are included with the .NET Framework support multiple password formats to enhance password security. 如果密码格式设置为，则用户将无法从数据库中检索其现有的密码。If the password format is set to , then users will not be able to retrieve their existing password from the database. 密码格式提供的密码值的单向编码。The password format provides one-way encoding of password values. 密码是"哈希"，并为身份验证的数据库中存储的值进行比较。Passwords are "hashed" and compared to values stored in the database for authentication. "哈希"值不能为反编码来检索原始密码值。"Hashed" values cannot be un-encoded to retrieve the original password value. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序使用的实例并启用密码检索。It specifies that the application use an instance of the and enables password retrieval. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例首先验证是`true`，然后检索指定的用户名的密码，并将其发送到的电子邮件地址指定的用户。The following code example first verifies that is `true`, then retrieves the password for a specified user name and sends it to the email address for the specified user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对于需要高的安全级别的站点不建议以使用电子邮件的明文形式返回的密码。Returning a password in clear text using email is not recommended for sites that require a high level of security. 对于高安全站点，我们建议你返回使用加密，如 SSL 的密码。For high-security sites, we recommend that you return passwords using encryption, such as SSL. > > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回成员资格用户的列表的电子邮件地址匹配所提供`emailToMatch`已配置的`applicationName`。 returns a list of membership users where the email address matches the supplied `emailToMatch` for the configured `applicationName`. 执行使用 LIKE 子句针对其搜索`emailToMatch`参数。The performs its search using a LIKE clause against the `emailToMatch` parameter. 像子句可以用在 SQL Server 支持任何通配符`emailToMatch`参数值。Any wildcards that are supported by SQL Server in LIKE clauses can be used in the `emailToMatch` parameter value. 返回的结果受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数标识的最大数对象中返回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回，其中 0 标识的第一页的结果页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where 0 identifies the first page. `totalRecords`参数是`out`参数设置为匹配的成员资格用户的总数`emailToMatch`值。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of membership users that matched the `emailToMatch` value. 例如，如果找到 13 个`emailToMatch`匹配的一部分或整个电子邮件地址，与`pageIndex`值为 1，`pageSize`为 5，返回将包含通过返回的第 10 个用户的第六个。For example, if 13 users were found where `emailToMatch` matched part of or the entire email address, and the `pageIndex` value was 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth users returned. `totalRecords` 将设置为 13。`totalRecords` would be set to 13. 删除 `emailToMatch` 参数值的前导和尾随空格。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from the `emailToMatch` parameter value. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回成员资格用户的列表在用户名与匹配所提供`usernameToMatch`已配置的`applicationName`。 returns a list of membership users where the user name matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` for the configured `applicationName`. 执行使用 LIKE 子句针对其搜索`usernameToMatch`参数。The performs its search using a LIKE clause against the `usernameToMatch` parameter. 像子句可以用在 SQL Server 支持任何通配符`usernameToMatch`参数值。Any wildcards that are supported by SQL Server in LIKE clauses can be used in the `usernameToMatch` parameter value. 返回的结果受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数标识的最大数对象中返回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回，其中 0 标识的第一页的结果页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where 0 identifies the first page. `totalRecords`参数是`out`参数设置为匹配的成员资格用户的总数`usernameToMatch`值。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of membership users that matched the `usernameToMatch` value. 例如，如果找到 13 个`usernameToMatch`匹配的一部分或整个的用户名，和`pageIndex`值为 1，`pageSize`为 5，返回将包含通过返回的第 10 个用户的第六个。For example, if 13 users were found where `usernameToMatch` matched part of or the entire user name, and the `pageIndex` value was 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth users returned. `totalRecords` 将设置为 13。`totalRecords` would be set to 13. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用于生成随机密码并最常使用的方法实现的成员资格提供程序的用户密码重置为新的临时密码。The method is used to generate a random password and is most commonly used by the method implemented by a membership provider to reset the password for a user to a new, temporary password. 生成的密码仅包含字母数字字符和以下标点符号： `!@#$%^&*()_-+=[{]};:<>|./?`。The generated password only contains alphanumeric characters and the following punctuation marks: `!@#$%^&*()_-+=[{]};:<>|./?`. 生成的密码中包含没有隐藏或非可打印的控制字符。No hidden or non-printable control characters are included in the generated password. > [!NOTE] > 通过创建随机密码方法不能保证传递中的正则表达式属性。The random password created by the method is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression in the property. 但是，随机的密码将满足条件由建立属性和`numberOfNonAlphanumericCharacters`参数。However, the random password will meet the criteria established by the property and the `numberOfNonAlphanumericCharacters` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建新的成员资格用户，并使用方法以初始化新的随机值，向用户显示用户的密码。The following code example creates a new membership user and uses the method to initialize the password for the new user to a random value, which is displayed to the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识使用的自定义的哈希算法类。The property identifies the custom hash algorithm used by the class. 你设置属性使用`hashAlgorithmType`元素的特性。You set the property using the `hashAlgorithmType` attribute of the element. .NET Framework 可以配置自定义加密类使用的元素的配置节。The .NET Framework enables you to configure custom cryptography classes using the element configuration section. 属性必须与匹配`name`元素中的元素的属性。The property must match the `name` attribute of the element in a element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[将算法名称映射到加密类](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/map-algorithm-names-to-cryptography-classes.md)。For more information, see [Mapping Algorithm Names to Cryptography Classes](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/map-algorithm-names-to-cryptography-classes.md). 如果未设置属性，类使用在中设置的哈希算法`validation`元素的特性。If the property is not set, the class uses the hash algorithm set in the `validation` attribute of the element.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts { get; }
.property int32 MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts
Public Shared ReadOnly Property MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts As Integer
public: static property int MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取在锁定成员资格用户之前允许的无效密码或密码答案尝试次数。

span.span: Gets the number of invalid password or password-answer attempts allowed before the membership user is locked out.

value.span: 锁定成员资格用户之前允许的无效密码或密码答案尝试次数。

span.span: The number of invalid password or password-answer attempts allowed before the membership user is locked out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性与结合工作属性以防止不需要的源使用重复尝试猜测的密码或密码提示问题答案的成员资格用户。The property works in conjunction with the property to guard against an unwanted source using repeated attempts to guess the password or password answer of a membership user. 如果成员资格用户是否大于或等于的值输入数无效密码或密码提示问题答案属性中指定的分钟数属性，则用户无法访问网站设置属性`true`直到用户解锁通过调用方法。If the number of invalid passwords or password answers entered for a membership user is greater than or equal to the value of the property within the number of minutes specified by the property, then the user is locked out of the Web site by setting the property to `true` until the user is unlocked by a call to the method. 如果值之前提供有效的密码或密码提示问题答案达到属性，跟踪的无效尝试次数的计数器设置为零。If a valid password or password answer is supplied before the value of the property is reached, the counter that tracks the number of invalid attempts is set to zero. 无效的密码和密码提示问题答案尝试分别进行跟踪。Invalid password and password answer attempts are tracked separately. 例如，如果属性设置为 5，用户具有最多五个尝试输入正确的密码和多达五次尝试不被锁定的情况下输入正确的密码答案。For example, if the property is set to 5, the user has up to five attempts to enter a correct password and up to five attempts to enter a correct password answer without being locked out. 在该应用程序配置中设置了属性值`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`配置元素的属性。The property value is set in the application configuration using the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute of the configuration element. 如果属性是`false`，则不会跟踪无效密码提示问题答案尝试次数。If the property is `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示中的元素`system.web`的应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of an application's Web.config file. 它指定应用程序使用的实例类以提供成员资格服务，并设置`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`属性设为五个无效的尝试次数和`passwordAttemptWindow`到 30 分钟。It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services, and sets the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute to five invalid attempts and the `passwordAttemptWindow` to 30 minutes. ``` ```

summary.span: 获取时间长度，在该时间间隔内对提供有效密码或密码答案的连续失败尝试次数进行跟踪。

span.span: Gets the time window between which consecutive failed attempts to provide a valid password or password answer are tracked.

value.span: 对未能提供有效密码或密码答案的连续尝试次数进行跟踪的时间长度（以分钟为单位）。

span.span: The time window, in minutes, during which consecutive failed attempts to provide a valid password or password answer are tracked.
The default is 10 minutes.

value.span: 如果当前失败尝试和上次失败尝试之间的间隔大于 属性设置，则每个失败尝试均被视为第一次失败尝试。

span.span: If the interval between the current failed attempt and the last failed attempt is greater than the property setting, each failed attempt is treated as if it were the first failed attempt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性与结合工作属性，以帮助防止不需要的源猜测的密码或密码提示问题答案的成员资格用户通过反复尝试。The property works in conjunction with the property to help guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 当用户尝试登录、 更改或重置他或她的密码时，在指定的时间窗口内只允许一定数量的连续尝试次数。When a user attempts to log in with, change, or reset his or her password, only a certain number of consecutive attempts are allowed within a specified time window. 中指定的此时间窗口长度属性，它标识的无效尝试之间所允许的分钟数。The length of this time window is specified in the property, which identifies the number of minutes allowed between invalid attempts. 如果的用户进行的连续失败尝试次数重置他或她的密码等于中存储的值属性，且时间自以来所经过最后一次的无效尝试中指定的分钟数小于属性，则成员资格用户被锁定。通过设置锁定用户属性`true`直到用户解锁通过调用方法。If the number of consecutive failed attempts that a user makes to reset his or her password equals the value stored in the property, and the time elapsed since the last invalid attempt is less than the number of minutes specified in the property, then the membership user is locked out. The user is locked out by setting the property to `true` until the user is unlocked by a call to the method. 如果当前的失败的尝试和最后一次失败的尝试之间的间隔大于属性设置，当前的无效尝试计为第一个。If the interval between the current failed attempt and the last failed attempt is greater than the property setting, the current invalid attempt is counted as the first. 如果在达到最大允许的无效尝试次数之前提供有效的密码提示问题答案，则的无效密码提示问题答案尝试次数的计数设置为 0 （零）。If a valid password answer is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password-answer attempts is set to 0 (zero). 如果之前所允许的最大数量无效提供一个有效的密码，则尝试达到的无效密码尝试次数的计数和的无效密码提示问题答案尝试次数的计数设置为 0 （零）。If a valid password is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password attempts and the count of invalid password-answer attempts are set to 0 (zero). 无效的密码和密码提示问题答案尝试次数累积独立于另一个。Invalid password and password-answer attempts accumulate independently of one another. 例如，如果设置为 5，和三个无效的密码尝试，随后进行了两个无效的密码提示问题答案尝试，两个更多的无效密码尝试 （或三个更多的无效密码提示问题答案尝试） 必须内进行成员资格用户被锁定。For example, if the is set to 5, and three invalid password attempts are made followed by two invalid password-answer attempts, two more invalid password attempts (or three more invalid password-answer attempts) must be made within for the membership user to be locked out. 使用应用程序配置中设置属性值`passwordAttemptWindow`节的配置元素属性。The property value is set in the application configuration by using the `passwordAttemptWindow` attribute of the configuration-element section. 如果属性设置为`false`，则不会跟踪无效密码提示问题答案尝试次数。If the property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序使用的实例和设置`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`属性设为五个无效的尝试次数和`passwordAttemptWindow`到 30 分钟。It specifies that the application use an instance of the and sets the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute to five invalid attempts and the `passwordAttemptWindow` to 30 minutes. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取用于验证从提供程序中指定的密码复杂性的正则表达式属性。The property gets the regular expression used to evaluate password complexity from the provider specified in the property. 属性设置在应用程序配置中使用`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`配置元素的属性。The property is set in the application configuration using the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute of the configuration element. 有关正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)。For more information about regular expressions, see [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示中的配置元素`system.web`的应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following code example shows the configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它指定应用程序使用的实例类以提供成员资格服务，并设置`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`属性设置为验证密码的正则表达式满足以下条件：It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services, and sets the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute to a regular expression that validates the password meets the following criteria: - 大于七个字符。Is greater than seven characters. - 包含至少一个数字。Contains at least one digit. - 包含至少一个特殊的 （非字母数字） 字符。Contains at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 如果密码不满足这些条件，密码不接受的成员资格提供程序。If the password does not meet these criteria, the password is not accepted by the membership provider. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够直接引用应用程序的默认成员资格提供程序。The property enables you to reference the default membership provider for an application directly. 这通常用于访问自定义成员资格提供程序的成员，它们不属于抽象基类。This is commonly used to access custom members of the membership provider that are not part of the abstract base class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例访问默认为应用程序使用启用属性，以便确定其值的自定义属性。The following code example accesses the default enabled for the application using the property in order to determine the value of the custom property. summary.span: 获取一个用于 ASP.NET 应用程序的成员资格提供程序的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the membership providers for the ASP.NET application.

value.span: 一个为 ASP.NET 应用程序配置的成员资格提供程序的 。

span.span: A of the membership providers configured for the ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用所有应用程序启用的成员资格提供程序，包括提供程序添加应用程序的 Web.config 文件和 Machine.config 文件的所有应用程序中。The property references all of the membership providers enabled for an application, including providers added in the Web.config file for the application and the Machine.config file for all applications. 你可以控制那些成员身份提供程序可用于应用程序中使用`providers`中你的应用程序的配置部分的元素。You can control which membership providers are available for an application using the `providers` element of the section in the configuration for your application. 例如，下面的示例演示在 Web.config 文件中的应用程序中删除部分实例 (`AspNetSqlProvider`) 在计算机配置文件中指定并添加实例名为`SqlProvider`为应用程序的默认成员资格提供程序。For example, the following sample shows the section in the Web.config file for an application that removes the instance (`AspNetSqlProvider`) specified in the machine configuration file and adds a instance named `SqlProvider` as the default membership provider for the application. ``` ``` 指定时[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)部分中，你必须指定`defaultProvider`属性。When specifying the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) section, you must specify the `defaultProvider` attribute. 如果不指定[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)将 web.config 文件，该计算机配置中的值中使用和实例名为`AspNetSqlProvider`则在建立作为`defaultProvider`.If you do not specify a [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) section in your Web.config, the values from the machine configuration are used and the instance named `AspNetSqlProvider` is established as the `defaultProvider`. 你可以获取的提供程序的强类型化的引用编制索引按名称的成员资格提供程序，然后将它强制转换为所需的类型的集合。You can obtain a strongly typed reference to a provider from the collection by indexing the membership provider by name and casting it as the desired type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例列出了为应用程序和它们各自的类型启用的提供程序。The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types. remarks.format: ## Remarks 需要密码提示问题和答案提供额外的安全性，在检索或重置用户的密码时。Requiring a password question and answer provides an additional layer of security when retrieving or resetting a user's password. 用户可以提供问题和答案创建其用户名称时，他们将可以更高版本使用，以检索或重置忘记了的密码。Users can supply a question and answer when their user name is created that they can later use to retrieve or reset a forgotten password. 时，检查或调用。 is checked when or is called. 提供使用.NET Framework 提供程序会引发如果是`true`和提供的密码答案`null`。The provider provided with the .NET Framework throws a if is `true` and the supplied password answer is `null`. 如果和都`false`，仍可用于强制实施的问题和答案创建时创建新用户的; 但是，问题和答案将不使用。If and are both `false`, can still be used to enforce the creation of questions and answers when new users are created; however, the question and answer will not be used. 你将能够使用检索问题类。You will be able to retrieve the question by using the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 。For more information, see and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序使用的实例，可以让密码重置，而且在执行重置时需要密码提示问题答案。It specifies that the application use an instance of the , enables password reset, and requires a password answer when performing a reset. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例检查的值并添加所需的密码提示问题和答案以创建用户时提供的控件。The following code sample checks the value of and adds the necessary controls for a password question and answer to be supplied when creating a user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). span.span: The number of minutes after the last-activity date/time stamp for a user during which the user is considered online.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值期间对的调用将检查。The property value is checked during the call to . 如果晚于当前日期和时间减去用户为值以分钟为单位，则用户将被视为联机。If the for a user is greater than the current date and time minus the value in minutes, then the user is considered online. 你可以确定成员资格用户是否被视为与联机属性类。You can determine whether a membership user is considered online with the property of the class. 为用户的凭据成功通过验证后，将更新用户方法。The for a user is updated when a user's credentials are successfully validated by the method. 你还可以更新成员资格用户时调用的一个重载。You can also update the for a membership user when you call one of the overloads. 如果调用采用重载`userIsOnline`参数，将值指定为`true`更新用户。If you call a overload that takes a `userIsOnline` parameter, specify a value of `true` to update the for the user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序使用的实例和设置`userIsOnlineTimeWindow`属性为 20 分钟。It specifies that the application use an instance of the and sets the `userIsOnlineTimeWindow` attribute to 20 minutes. ``` ```

summary.span: 在创建了用户、更改了密码或重置了密码时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user is created, a password is changed, or a password is reset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时方法，方法，或调用的成员资格提供程序方法。The event is raised when the method, the method, or the method of a membership provider is called. 你可以使用事件来验证密码格式和的成员资格用户的值。You can use the event to validate password formats and values for membership users. 你可以取消当前， ，或通过设置的操作属性所提供的到`true`期间事件。You can cancel the current , , or action by setting the property of the supplied to `true` during the event. 如果通过设置取消当前操作属性`true`，你可以设置属性所提供的到描述密码验证失败的原因的异常。If you cancel the current action by setting the property to `true`, you can set the property of the supplied to an exception that describes the reason for the password-validation failure. 调用的方法将引发异常，属性设置为。The calling method will throw the exception that the property is set to. 如果属性是`null`，调用方将引发一般密码验证失败异常。If the property is `null`, the caller will throw a generic password-validation-failure exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件，用于验证用户的密码的格式并取消操作，如果密码不匹配所需的格式。The following code example shows a event that validates the format of the password for a user and cancels the action if the password does not match the required format.
